+2 [ICON_Food] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, and +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold from each [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic, [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifact, and Sculpture [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Work of Art in addition to the usual [ICON_Culture] Culture. 在淡水和海岸旁定居时仅提供+1 [ICON_HOUSING] 住房，而每座农场提供的 [ICON_HOUSING] 住房和 [ICON_GOLD] 金币额外+1。每有一种奢侈品与市中心相邻，则+1 [ICON_AMENITIES] 宜居度。

Settling adjacent to Fresh Water and Coast only provide +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing, instead each Farm provides an additional +1 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +1 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenity for every Luxury adjacent to the City Center.

Non capital cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +10% to all yields. Non capital cities within 9 tiles and outside 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital yields remain usual. Other non capital cities receive -15% to all yields. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength to units within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital.
所有您创建或攻占的城市一开始便拥有贸易站。如果位于您 [ICON_Capital] 首都的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线范围内，城市自动建立一条通至罗马的路。您的 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线经过您的城市贸易站+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。建造市中心建筑时+25% [ICON_Production] 生产力。

All cities you found or conquer start with a Trading Post. If in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route range of your [ICON_Capital] Capital, they also start with a road to it. Your [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes earn +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for passing through Trading Posts in your own cities.+25% [ICON_production] Production towads builings in the City Center.

游戏初始便解锁“航海术”与“造船术”科技，同时拥有进入海洋单元格的能力。水运单位+2 [ICON_Movement] 移动力。未改良的树林与雨林提供+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。“重商主义”额外提供+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力、+“行政部门”额外提供+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力、“保护地球”额外+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] 生产力。渔船提供+1 [ICON_FOOD] 食物，并向相邻单元格投放文化炸弹。无法收获资源；无法获得 [ICON_GreatWriter] 大作家。

Begin the game with the Sailing and Shipbuilding technologies unlocked and with the ability to enter Ocean tiles. Embarked units gain +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Unimproved Woods and Rainforest are +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Additional +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Mercantilism ,+1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Civil Service and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Conservation. Fishing Boats provide +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and a Culture Bomb to adjacent tiles. Resources cannot be harvested. [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writers cannot be earned.
起始城市中的每个沙漠平原单元格为所有[ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线提供+1 [ICON_GOLD] 金币。文明每次进入黄金时代后可获得永久+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。
All [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every flat Desert tile in the origin city. Receive +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Capacity every time you enter a Golden Age.
